name: Power flicker
log: Power flickers in the corridor. A circuit trips.

name: Cold draft
log: A cold draft seeps through the bulkhead seam.

name: Filter clog
log: The filtration unit coughs. Air quality dips.

name: Condensation
log: Condensation pools in a tray. You recover a little water.

name: Ration leak
log: A ration pack splits at the seal.
